sentences.english: She was hatted a big white straw hat to match her pink dress.
sentences.chinese: 她戴了一頂白色的大草帽來配搭那件粉紅色的連衣裙。

sentences.english: Hand-woven straw hats take a sunbath under the hot sun.
sentences.chinese: 手工編織的草帽，在屋前排好隊，進行日光浴。

sentences.english: My straw hat blew off, mama!
sentences.chinese: 媽媽，我的草帽北風吹掉了。

sentences.english: Monkey Tom picked up a little straw hat.
sentences.chinese: 小猴湯姆拾到一頂小草帽。

sentences.english: Mine I had snatched from my knees and held over my head, by a sort of instinct.
sentences.chinese: 思嘉從擱板上一把抓起她的寬邊草帽隨手扣在頭上。

sentences.english: He looked like a farmer—he was slim and wore a straw cowboy hat.
sentences.chinese: 他看起來像個農民，個頭挺高，戴一頂牛仔草帽。

sentences.english: His straw hat stuck jauntily on the side of his head .
sentences.chinese: 他那頂草帽時髦地斜扣在頭上。

sentences.english: She wears a large straw hat at the beach.
sentences.chinese: 她在沙灘上戴了一頂大草帽。

sentences.english: A:Do you really like this straw hat,dear?
sentences.chinese: 親愛的，你真喜歡這種草帽嗎？

sentences.english: Scarlett caught up her wide straw bonnet from the console table and jammed it on her head.
sentences.chinese: 思嘉從擱板上一把抓起她的寬邊草帽隨手扣在頭上。

sentences.english: How does your straw hat stop on in the high wind.
sentences.chinese: 風這麼大，你的草帽怎麼戴得住？

sentences.english: For some, untucked, descended her sheaved hat.
sentences.chinese: 從她的草帽邊垂下的幾綹雲鬟。

sentences.english: Why does the Sombrero Galaxy look like a hat?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼草帽星系看起來像一頂帽子呢？

sentences.english: Yeah. They really need a tank/defense specialist.
sentences.chinese: 回樓上，是啊，草帽團需要一個肉盾型防禦角色了。

sentences.english: Father covered his legs with an old coat and went on making straw hats.
sentences.chinese: 父親用舊上衣蓋着腿又繼續編草帽。

definition: cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
Chinese skullcap resembling the skin of half a watermelon
